Dachande, can you IM me? I need to discuss something with ya (nothing 
about the rules this time).


::Shredder::

Shredder steps into the conference room and sits down as Magmatron 
begins his speach. He listens through, looking at the body of the 
queen and considering something. At the end he stands up, asking a 
question.

"If one of us volunteers for that thing," he says, reffering to the 
queen, "Will we keep our memories and stuff?"




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dachande" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
> ::Magmatron::
> 
>     "Yes, please take a seat," Magmatron said, looking over the 
table. The lights brightened at his look. Then he began his speach.
>     "Now, we have reformed. You will all be given quarters, and we 
will be taking things at a much more....agressive tone. We have made 
relations with the Alliance. And from what Cerberus has shown me, 
they are quite powerful, we are not able to take them on directly.
>     "Our first target, though, will be the remaining Predacons. 
Scanners have reported a big ship landing nearby, and if they get 
organized they will be quite, well, more worthy opponents then they 
are."
>     He started to walk around to all of them. "Good, we have 
Destrons capable of flight, that can be a great source of attack. I 
would like to introduce you to a mainstay in out army. Nightmares, 
Dachande, Preatorian, and Jynx, please step up." ::They step 
up:: "These our the more powerful warriors I have created, Beast 
Mode." ::They transform to Beast Mode::  "As you will notice they all 
have almost the same Beast Mode, meaning that they would be hard to 
notice one in a crowd. Ahh, but they are in need of powerful Sparks 
to control them. I am one, but then another, for more direct battle 
control, is needed. They will command this new body." ::A panal opens 
from the right of Magmatron and in it is the Queen, she raises her 
head and stares at the other Destrons, then she hisses and shows off 
her inner mouth:: "A magnificent, isn't it? I admire it's perfection, 
it has no fear, no reason to fear. But back to the subject at hand. 
The Cybertronian Fire is under attack by the Alliance, well, they are 
at a cease fire. They are quite weak now, the Maximals. But, the 
Predacons are not organized at all. Then there are the smaller 
groups, the Mafia, the Stunticons, the smaller Maximal groups, we 
could easily take them out. I shall take your questions now."
>     Before anybody says anything Magmatron interupts. "Ohh, and one 
more thing, Optimus Prime, the 'great' Autobot leader, is among us on 
this planet. He has been changed to darkness by some unseen force, I 
wish to know more, If you see him, do not engage, just watch."
